'''1.19.2''' is a minor update to {{JE}}, released on August 5, 2022,<ref name="article_1.19.2">{{Mcnet|minecraft-java-edition-1-19-2|Minecraft 1.19.2|August 5, 2022}}</ref> which fixes two critical issues. This version is compatible with [[Java Edition 1.19.1|1.19.1]] servers.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.19.2,1.19.2 Release Candidate 2,1.19.2 Release Candidate 1|otherissuescount=2}}
'''Other'''
* Fixed an issue causing players to get disconnected with secure chat.<ref name="article_1.19.2"/>
* Fixed a crash in the social interactions screen.<ref name="article_1.19.2"/>
